mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_OPERATION_MAIN (OPERATION_MAIN_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, OPERATION_NAME, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR, OPERATION_DATE) values (#{operationMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.select: select OPERATION_MAIN_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, OPERATION_NAME, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR, OPERATION_DATE from V_HIS_OPERATION_MAIN where OPERATION_MAIN_ID = #{operationMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
